headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Sentence of Terence Hamill. COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER. The Result of the Holmes Case. The Gift Enterprises. Contracts not Complied with. Salaries of Clerks in the Finance Department. Receipts of the Sixth and Eighth-Avenue Railroads. Fire Ii Spring-street. The Cudbirth Seduction Case. Personal Intelligence. Norton's Book Sale. Mechanics' Institute. Clean Streets. Short Weight. The Sterling Hotel. Board of Councilmen COURT CALENDAR UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT U. S. COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE. COMMON PLEAS--SPECIAL TERM.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the opening of the Court this morning, the District Attorney moved for judgment on TERENCE HAMILL, convicted on Tuesday last of manslaughter in the second degree. The prisoner was then placed at the bar, and asked if he had anything to say for himself.

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE; By Telegraph to the New York Daily Times. THREE DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE. ARRIVAL OF THE AMERICA AT HALIFAX. NOTHING FROM THE SEAT OF WAR. The Vienna Conference in Difficulties on the Third Point Cotton Firm and Active---Bradstuffs Dreeping. By House's Printing Telegraph, No. 21 Wall-steet.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship America, Capt. LANG, from Liverpool, at 10 o'clock A. M., on the 31st ult., arrived at this port at about 7 o'clock last evening. The America reports, April 5, lat. 50[degree] 30[degree] N., Ion. 25[degree] 37 [degree] passed the American ship Flag of Truce, steering Eastward. On the 6th, lat. 50[degree] 12[degree] N., Ion. 30[degree] 44[degree] W., exchanged signals with the ship St. Lawrence, steering West.

docs.lead_paragraph: One of the most remarkable men, in some respects, in the Republic, was suddenly called a way from his earthly labors a few days since--the late Senator PHELPS, of Vermont. headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; MURDER TRIALS. Trial of Anna Maria Durchag for the Murder of her Child. ACQUITTAL OF THE PRISONER. COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER. Before lion. Judge B. P. Cowles, Trial of John B. Helmes for Killing David Gourlay, the Policeman.

docs.lead_paragraph: This day had been set apart for the triai of PETER M. LAWSON, charged with the murder efJOHN O'NEELB, by stabbing him with a knife on the 17th of December, 1854, but on the application of his counsel (Mr. HENRY L. (CLINTON) the case was postponed until Monday next on account of the non-arrival of material witnesses for the defence, who have been sent for front distant parts of the Union.

headline.main: FROM HAVANA.; Siate of Affairs--The Captain General Nervons.

docs.lead_paragraph: My last advice was to the 31st ult., per United States war steamer Fulton, MITCHELL, Commander, which left that day for Norfolk, supposed with dispatches for the United States Government. We learn that the United States steam frigate Princeton, Commander EAGLE, is to remain here until further instructions or relief is ordered by the Commodore of the Home Squadron. is satisfactory to our traders
